verses.roman:
ei-rūpe kautuka kari' śacīra nandana
antardhāna kaila, keha nā pāya darśana

synonyms: ei-rūpe—in this way; kautuka kari'-making fun; śacīra nandana—the son of mother Śacī; antardhāna kaila—disappeared; keha—anyone; nā—does not; pāya—get; darśana—audience.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, the son of Śacīdevī, then suddenly and humorously disappeared from everyone's sight, and it was impossible for anyone to find Him.
